#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int x1,y1,x2,y2,num,den;
        cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
        num= abs(y2-y1);
        den=abs(x2-x1);
        if((x1==x2)||(y1==y2))
        {
            cout<<0<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        int g= __gcd(num,den);
        num /=g;
        den /=g;

        if(num==den)
            cout<<num*g<<endl;
        else
            cout<<(num+den-1)*g<<endl;


    }
}
